en: It is better not to go out of your field.
zh: 最好别离开自己的领域。

en: The field measures more than 300 acres.
zh: 这块地有300多英亩。

en: The field was rank with weeds.
zh: 地里长满了杂草。

en: The field is crying out for rain.
zh: 这地渴得厉害，急需一场雨。

en: Your skin is breaking out.
zh: 你皮肤在长痘。

en: It's chilly.
zh: 天凉飕飕的。

en: Exposing skin excessively to the sun causes sunburn, sometimes blisters.
zh: 皮肤晒太久会晒伤，有时还会起水泡。

en: He stood for freedom of speech for everyone regardless of color.
zh: 他主张言论自由，不管什么肤色的人都一样。

en: I have greasy skin.
zh: 我皮肤很油。

en: I have dry skin.
zh: 我皮肤很干。

en: The skin gradually took on a healthier look.
zh: 皮肤慢慢看着更健康了。

en: I have a serious skin problem.
zh: 我皮肤问题挺严重的。

en: You must be quite accustomed to using chopsticks by now.
zh: 你现在用筷子应该已经挺熟练了吧。

en: Dreams flew out of that box when it was opened: dreams of secrets written in disappearing ink and of overwhelming odors.
zh: 盒子一打开，梦想就飞了出来：有关于隐形墨水写的秘密，还有那些气息浓烈的梦。

en: May I open the box?
zh: 我可以打开这个盒子吗？

en: The box was heavy, but he managed to carry it.
zh: 盒子很重，但他还是搬动了。

en: The box is empty. But give it a touch.
zh: 盒子是空的，但你摸一下试试。

en: The box was open and empty.
zh: 盒子开着，里面是空的。

en: The contents of the box are listed on the label.
zh: 盒子里装了什么，标签上都写着呢。

en: I looked into the box.
zh: 我往盒子里看了看。

en: Look into the box.
zh: 往盒子里看看。

en: All the eggs in the box were broken.
zh: 盒子里所有的蛋都碎了。

en: Some of the apples in the box were rotten.
zh: 盒子里有些苹果烂了。

en: There are a lot of tools in the box.
zh: 盒子里有很多工具。

en: There is a doll in the box.
zh: 盒子里有个娃娃。

en: There are some empty bottles in the box.
zh: 盒子里有几个空瓶子。

en: What is in the box?
zh: 盒子里是什么？

en: Are there any apples in the box?
zh: 盒子里有苹果吗？

en: There are some pears in the box.
zh: 盒子里有几个梨。

en: There are some eggs in the box.
zh: 盒子里有几个蛋。

en: Inside the box were cuttings from newspapers and magazines.
zh: 盒子里是些从报纸杂志上剪下来的剪报。

en: There are many apples in the box. Some are red and others are yellow.
zh: 盒子里有很多苹果，有红的也有黄的。

en: There are six apples in the box.
zh: 盒子里有六个苹果。

en: The shape of a box is usually square.
zh: 盒子的形状通常是方的。

en: The boxes vary in size from small to large.
zh: 这些盒子大大小小的，什么尺寸都有。

en: The box was too big and awkward, so I put these in a bag and brought them.
zh: 那个盒子又大又不方便拿，我就把这些装袋子里带过来了。

en: We found all the boxes empty.
zh: 我们发现所有的盒子都是空的。

en: It is really lovely to go up Mt. Hakodate and look at the night view of Hakodate city.
zh: 去函馆山看函馆的夜景真的太美了。

en: I could not resist the lure of great profits.
zh: 我抵挡不住巨大利润的诱惑。

en: Bomb-making criminals frequently have the motive of wanting public attention.
zh: 制造炸弹的罪犯往往是想博取公众关注。

en: Explosives went off with a bang.
zh: 炸药“砰”的一声爆炸了。

en: Experts have failed to come up with an explanation of why the explosion happened.
zh: 专家们还没法解释爆炸到底是怎么发生的。

en: The explosion frightened the villagers.
zh: 爆炸把村民们都吓坏了。

en: She came back ten minutes after the explosion.
zh: 爆炸发生十分钟后，她回来了。

en: The explosion ruled out their survival.
zh: 爆炸之后，他们根本不可能生还。

en: The explosion killed several passers-by.
zh: 爆炸导致几名路人丧生。

en: The explosion shook the whole building.
zh: 爆炸震得整栋楼都在晃。

en: There was an explosion, and before anyone could say Jack Robinson, the airplane burst into flame and fell.
zh: 突然一声爆炸，还没等大家反应过来，飞机就起火掉下去了。

en: Such was the explosion that the roof was blown off.
zh: 爆炸威力巨大，把房顶都掀翻了。

en: The explosion was so powerful that the roof was blown away.
zh: 爆炸太猛烈了，屋顶都被炸飞了。

en: It was such a powerful explosion that the roof was blown off.
zh: 爆炸威力太大了，连房顶都被掀飞了。

en: Security at the airport has been stepped up since the bomb scare.
zh: 自从出了炸弹惊魂那档子事，机场安检就加强了。

en: An A-bomb is a terrible weapon.
zh: 原子弹真是个可怕的武器。

en: When the bomb was dropped, I felt the house rock back and forth.
zh: 炸弹落下的时候，我感觉房子都在前后摇晃。

en: It was at that very moment that the bomb went off.
zh: 就在那一刻，炸弹爆炸了。

en: When the bomb exploded, I happened to be there.
zh: 炸弹爆炸的时候，我刚好就在那儿。

en: The twilight came on.
zh: 暮色降临了。

en: Back into the hole where I was born.
zh: 回到我出生的那个洞穴里去。

en: You shouldn't read in such poor light.
zh: 光线这么暗，你不该看书。

en: Her face was not clear in the poor light.
zh: 光线太暗了，看不清她的脸。

en: I saw his face in the dim light.
zh: 借着微弱的光，我看到了他的脸。

en: Not a few people think that all foreign-made articles are superior to ones made in this country.
zh: 不少人都觉得洋货比国货好。

en: Her eyes are rolled back.
zh: 她的眼睛翻上去了。

en: Her gray hair makes her look older than her age.
zh: 她的白头发让她看起来比实际年龄要老。

en: I'm getting more and more gray hair.
zh: 我的白头发越来越多了。

en: The swans migrate from here to Florida.
zh: 天鹅从这里迁徙到佛罗里达。

en: The swans on the river make a dreamlike scene.
zh: 河里的天鹅美得像画一样。

en: A beam of white light is split by a prism into rays of various colors.
zh: 一束白光被三棱镜折射成了各种颜色的光。

en: Let's make clear which is right and which is wrong.
zh: 咱们把谁对谁错说清楚。

en: We have a black and white dog.
zh: 我们家有一只黑白相间的狗。

en: Black and white television sets have gone out of date.
zh: 黑白电视机早就过时了。

en: Get it settled once and for all.
zh: 把它彻底解决掉，一劳永逸。

en: White wine is the usual companion of fish.
zh: 鱼肉通常要配白葡萄酒。

en: Would you like white wine or red?
zh: 你想喝白葡萄酒还是红酒？

en: White paint will brighten the room.
zh: 刷白漆会让屋里显得更亮堂。

en: The color white is a symbol of purity.
zh: 白色象征着纯洁。

en: Keep away from the unlicensed taxis.
zh: 别去坐黑车。

en: The girl who is dressed in white is my fiancée.
zh: 那个穿白衣服的女孩是我的未婚妻。

en: The girl dressed in white is his fiancée.
zh: 穿白衣服的那个女孩是他的未婚妻。

en: The lady dressed in white is a famous actress.
zh: 那个穿白衣服的女士是个著名演员。

en: The woman who wore the white clothes was out to a party.
zh: 那个穿白衣服的女人出去参加聚会了。

en: White doves are pretty birds.
zh: 白鸽是很漂亮的小鸟。

en: We saw a white ship far away.
zh: 我们看见远处有一艘白船。

en: A white ship came into view.
zh: 一艘白船映入了眼帘。

en: The girl in a white uniform took my temperature.
zh: 那个穿白大褂的女孩子给我量了体温。

en: A white cloud is floating in the blue sky.
zh: 蓝天里漂着一朵白云。

en: There were white clouds sailing in the sky.
zh: 天空中有白云在飘动。

en: I saw a white cloud sailing across the sky.
zh: 我看到一朵白云飘过天空。

en: A white cloud is floating in the blue summer sky.
zh: 夏日的蓝天里漂着一朵白云。

en: A white yacht was sailing over the sea.
zh: 一艘白色的游艇在海上航行。

en: It's better to chill white wine before you serve it.
zh: 白葡萄酒喝之前冰一下更好。

en: A white lily is very beautiful to look at.
zh: 白百合看起来非常漂亮。

en: I like the one with a white belt.
zh: 我喜欢那个带白腰带的。

en: The white boat went down the stream.
zh: 那艘白船顺流而下。

en: The white parasol is hers.
zh: 那把白色的遮阳伞是她的。

en: There is a white dove on the roof.
zh: 屋顶上有一只白鸽。

en: The girl wearing a white dress is my sister.
zh: 那个穿白裙子的女孩是我姐姐。

en: Is it white?
zh: 是白色的吗？

en: Do you have a dress in white?
zh: 你有白色的裙子吗？

en: At a word from the ballet master in the white suit, the room will come alive.
zh: 那个穿白西装的芭蕾大师一发话，屋子里就活跃起来了。

en: Do you have any shirt in white?
zh: 你有白色的衬衫吗？

en: The white drapery does not blend with the black wall.
zh: 白窗帘跟黑墙一点都不搭。

en: Two rabbits, a white rabbit and a black rabbit, lived in a large forest.
zh: 大森林里住着两只兔子，一只白的，一只黑的。

en: The exposition will be held for six months.
zh: 博览会要开半年。

en: The exhibition will be open for another month.
zh: 展览还会再开一个月。

en: How far is it to the museum?
zh: 去博物馆有多远？

en: Will you show me the way to the museum?
zh: 能告诉我去博物馆怎么走吗？

en: You cannot enter the museum. It is currently under repair.
zh: 博物馆进不去，现在正装修呢。

en: Is this the right way to the museum?
zh: 这是去博物馆的路吗？

en: The museum had to close due to lack of finances.
zh: 因为缺钱，博物馆只好关门了。

en: I understand the museum is closed on Mondays.
zh: 我听说博物馆周一不开放。

en: The museum is around the corner.
zh: 博物馆就在转角处。

en: Where is the entrance to the museum?
zh: 博物馆的入口在哪儿？

en: Where's the entrance to the museum?
zh: 博物馆的入口在哪？

en: You'll see two buildings right opposite the museum, and the restaurant is in the taller of the two.
zh: 博物馆正对面有两栋楼，餐厅就在高的那一栋里。

en: There was a sprinkling of foreigners among the visitors in the museum.
zh: 博物馆的游客里零星有几个外国人。

en: There are no live animals in the museum.
zh: 博物馆里没有活的动物。

en: Visitors were few at the museum.
zh: 博物馆里的游客没几个。

en: There are some interesting exhibits in the museum.
zh: 博物馆里有些展品挺有意思的。

en: You have to get on that bus to go to the museum.
zh: 你得坐那辆公交车去博物馆。

en: Gambling brought about his failure.
zh: 赌博让他倾家荡产。

en: The Shinkansen from Hakata pulled in just on time.
zh: 从博多开来的新干线准时进站了。

en: I'll buy a through ticket to Hakata.
zh: 我要买一张去博多的直达票。

en: No one can approach him in wideness of knowledge.
zh: 论知识渊博，没人能比得上他。

en: Who shall decide when doctors disagree?
zh: 医生们意见不一的时候，该听谁的？

en: The doctors inquired into the mystery of nature.
zh: 医生们在探索大自然的奥秘。

en: Uncle asked: "What is three plus four?"
zh: 叔叔问：“三加四等于几？”

en: Keep off the flies.
zh: 别让苍蝇落在那上面。

en: The jury's guilty verdict gave rise to widespread debate.
zh: 陪审团的有罪判决引发了广泛的争论。

en: The jury has returned a verdict of guilty.
zh: 陪审团判定有罪。

en: The jury acquitted him of the crime.
zh: 陪审团宣判他无罪。

en: The jury is hung.
zh: 陪审团无法达成一致意见。

en: The jury were asked to allow for the age of the accused.
zh: 陪审团被要求考虑到被告的年龄。

en: Sales fell short of their goal.
zh: 销售额没达标。

en: Sales are amazingly brisk.
zh: 销量好得惊人。

en: Relative to overall sales, that of software is insignificant.
zh: 跟总销售额相比，软件的销量微不足道。

en: Don't worry about making lots of sales.
zh: 别担心能不能卖出很多。

en: We worked hard so as to increase our sales.
zh: 我们拼命工作是为了提高销量。

en: In proportion as the sales increase, the profit will rise.
zh: 利润会随着销量的增加而上涨。

en: The sales are slipping.
zh: 销量在下滑。

en: Sales fell off in the third quarter.
zh: 第三季度的销量下降了。

en: A seller's market is a market in which goods are relatively scarce, buyers have a limited range of choice, and prices are high.
zh: 卖方市场就是货少、买家没啥选择且价格还高的市场。

en: As the men walked up and down the rows of people, they shouted, "Get your dachshund sausages!"
zh: 那些人穿梭在人群里，大喊着：“快买腊肠啊！”

en: I had my umbrella taken while I was shopping.
zh: 我买东西的时候雨伞被拿走了。

en: You will be better off buying a new one than trying to fix it.
zh: 你买个新的比修一个要划算。

en: What you cannot afford to buy, do without.
zh: 买不起的东西就别买了。

en: She left the store because she didn't have anything else that she had to buy.
zh: 她离开了商店，因为她没啥要买的了。

en: Before deciding to buy it, I tried on the jacket to see if it would fit.
zh: 决定买之前，我先试了下那件夹克看合不合身。

en: It is up to you whether to buy it or not.
zh: 买不买随你。

en: Shoppers crowded the streets.
zh: 街上挤满了购物的人。

en: The shoppers stood in a line.
zh: 买东西的人都在排队。

en: Shoppers hurried along the sidewalk.
zh: 逛街的人在人行道上匆匆走过。

en: I will call you when I have done my shopping.
zh: 我买完东西后会给你打电话。

en: Would you like to go shopping with me?
zh: 你想和我一起去逛街吗？

en: As I didn't have time to go shopping today, I had to make do with a sandwich for dinner.
zh: 因为今天没时间去买东西，我晚饭只好凑合吃了个三明治。

en: Can you do some shopping for me?
zh: 你能帮我买点东西吗？

en: Did you check all the items on the shopping list?
zh: 购物清单上的东西你都核实了吗？

en: I would rather stay at home than go shopping.
zh: 我宁愿待在家里也不想去逛街。

en: You are an angel for doing my shopping.
zh: 你帮我买东西，真是个大好人。

en: What do you say to going shopping?
zh: 去逛街怎么样？

en: I have to go shopping.
zh: 我得去买点东西。

en: Would you like to come shopping with me?
zh: 你想和我一起去逛街吗？

en: Please drop by when you go out for shopping sometimes.
zh: 你出去买东西的时候顺便过来坐坐吧。

en: A buyers' market is a market in which goods are plentiful, buyers have a wide range of choices, and prices are low.
zh: 买方市场是指货物供应充足、买家选择余地大且价格低廉的市场。

en: From the buyer's point of view, the prices of these CD players are too high.
zh: 从买家的角度来看，这些CD机的价格太高了。

en: Mr Umemura teaches us English.
zh: 梅村先生教我们英语。

en: It looks like the rainy season is going to start after next week.
zh: 看起来下周过后就要进入梅雨季节了。

en: The sky is gloomy and gray - a typical rainy-season sky.
zh: 天阴沉沉、灰蒙蒙的，是典型的梅雨天的样子。

en: The rainy season sets in about the end of June.
zh: 梅雨季节大约在六月底开始。

en: When will the rainy season be over?
zh: 梅雨季节什么时候结束？

en: I wonder when the rainy season will end.
zh: 我在想梅雨季节什么时候会结束。

en: Rainy season has begun.
zh: 梅雨季节开始了。

en: It is our rainy season.
zh: 现在是我们的梅雨季节。

en: The plum blossoms are at their best this week.
zh: 这周梅花开得正旺。

en: Plum blossoms come out in March.
zh: 梅花在三月开放。

en: I'll pay double the price.
zh: 我出双倍的价格。

en: The mailman left a letter for her.
zh: 邮递员给她留了一封信。

en: Do you charge for delivery?
zh: 送货收费吗？

en: We have two deliveries every day.
zh: 我们每天送两次货。

en: Do not sign a delivery receipt unless it accurately lists the goods received.
zh: 除非送货单上准确列出了收到的货物，否则不要签字。

en: Can you deliver this?
zh: 这个能送货吗？

en: As I checked your delivery that I received, I found it included a T-shirt which I did not order.
zh: 我查了一下收到的包裹，发现里面有一件我没订过的T恤。

en: I had an artificial insemination with sperm from my husband.
zh: 我接受了丈夫精子的人工授精。

en: I built the kit taking care not to make mistakes in the wiring.
zh: 我在组装这套工具时很小心，没让接线出错。

en: Pneumonia causes difficulty in breathing.
zh: 肺炎会导致呼吸困难。

en: It took me a long time to recover from pneumonia.
zh: 我花了很长时间才从肺炎中康复。

en: There is a connection between smoking and lung cancer.
zh: 吸烟和肺癌之间有联系。

en: It may cause lung cancer, too.
zh: 它也可能导致肺癌。

en: Uniform number No. 7 is his younger brother.
zh: 穿7号球衣的是他弟弟。

en: Please wash my back.
zh: 请帮我搓搓背。

en: I was kicked in the back.
zh: 我的背上被踢了一脚。

en: Someone kicked my back.
zh: 有人踢了我的背。

en: Someone kicked me in the back.
zh: 有人朝我后背踢了一脚。

en: I feel a pain in the back.
zh: 我觉得背疼。

en: A sore back hindered me from playing tennis.
zh: 背痛让我没法打网球。

en: My back is killing me.
zh: 我的腰快疼死了。

en: I have a backache.
zh: 我腰疼。

en: My back still hurts.
zh: 我的背还在疼。

en: He fought a last-ditch battle.
zh: 他进行了最后的殊死搏斗。

en: The man was of normal height.
zh: 那个男人身高很普通。

en: She twists around at a voice behind.
zh: 她听到身后有声音，转过头去。

en: The police say there's someone pulling string behind the scenes.
zh: 警察说这事儿幕后有人在操纵。

en: Carry your head high.
zh: 挺胸抬头。

en: Straighten up.
zh: 站直了。

en: That seat reclines further.
zh: 那个座儿能再往后靠点儿。

en: A tall man intruded into my apartment with a gun.
zh: 一个高个子男人持枪闯进了我的公寓。

en: At the moment she saw a tall man with a gun standing in the doorway, she instinctively backed away.
zh: 看到门口站着个拿枪的高个子男人，她本能地往后退。

en: A tall man came up to me.
zh: 一个高个子男人朝我走了过来。

en: The tall man came out of the house.
zh: 那个高个子男人从屋里出来了。

en: A tall man went off from there in a hurry.
zh: 一个高个子男人急匆匆地从那儿离开了。

en: A tall boy is standing at the gate.
zh: 大门口站着个高个子男生。

en: A tall woman came along.
zh: 一个高个子女人走了过来。

en: I have to eat, too.
zh: 我也得吃饭啊。

en: Being short is a disadvantage to a volleyball player.
zh: 个子矮对排球运动员来说是个劣势。

en: Not being tall is not a serious disadvantage in life.
zh: 在生活中，个子不高也不是什么严重的缺陷。

en: Not being tall isn't a disadvantage.
zh: 个子不高并不是什么劣势。

en: Defeat and failure make people too humble.
zh: 失败和挫折会让人变得太卑微。

en: The defeated army retreated from the country.
zh: 败军撤出了那个国家。

en: Rumors of defeat were abroad.
zh: 到处都在传战败的消息。

en: The losers received a "prize" too: They were beaten up by the winning team!

en: The town in ruins, burning, people and children being killed.

en: The ruined castle is now under restoration.

en: Actors, artists, musicians, and writers may use many forms including spoken and written words, actions, colors and sounds.
zh: 演员、艺术家、音乐家和作家会用到很多形式，包括语言、文字、动作、色彩和声音。

en: Haiku are closely related to the seasons of the year.

en: Look at that knight on the horse.

en: The horse and buggy is now definitely out of date.

en: I'm putting my ass in a sling for you.

en: Is that all you can talk about - the Internet?

en: He that knows little often repeats it.

en: Don't have me on!

en: Come on, don't be silly.

zh: 别犯傻。

en: This is ridiculous!

en: Impossible!

en: You boob! I should not have asked you.

en: Nonsense!

en: You can take a horse to water, but you can't make him drink.
zh: 你可以把马牵到水边，但没法强迫它喝水。

en: You can lead a horse to water, but you can't make him drink.
zh: 你可以把马牵到水边，但不能强迫它喝水。

en: You can lead a horse to water, but you can't make it drink.
zh: 你可以把马牵到水边，但没法让它喝水。

en: The horse is a useful animal.

zh: 马是有用的动物。

en: Horses are animals.

en: A horse runs quickly.

en: A horse can run faster than a man can.

en: A horse is a friendly animal.
zh: 马是很友好的动物。

en: Horses are friendly animals.
zh: 马是很友好的动物。

zh: 马是家畜。

en: The horse is a very useful animal.

en: A horse can run very fast.
zh: 马能跑得很快。

zh: 上马之前，通常得先给马备上鞍子。

en: Get on a horse.

en: Get on the horse.
zh: 上马吧。

en: If you mate a horse with an ass you will get a mule.
zh: 马和驴交配会生出骡子。

en: A horse is very useful.
zh: 马很有用。

en: I saw a horse galloping toward me.

en: A whale is no less a mammal than a horse.

en: Basho was the greatest poet.
zh: 芭蕉是最伟大的诗人。

en: An unscrupulous person would sell even his own mother down the river.
zh: 没良心的人连自己亲妈都能卖了。

en: Wide is the gate and broad is the way that leads to destruction.

en: My water broke.
zh: 我羊水破了。

en: A devastating earthquake hit the state capital.
zh: 一场毁灭性的地震袭击了省会。

en: It has been estimated that, as a result of the destruction, fifty species of wildlife are disappearing from the earth each day.
zh: 据估计，由于破坏，每天有五十种野生动物从地球上消失。

en: Factional in-fighting threw a monkey wrench into the deliberations.
zh: 派系斗争搞砸了审议过程。

en: I fell down really hard and got a black bruise on my knee.
zh: 我摔得可重了，膝盖都磕青了。

en: A stormy life? It's fine to watch that kind of thing on TV but I wouldn't actually want to live it.
zh: 波澜起伏的人生？电视上看看还行，我可不想亲身经历。

en: Wave after wave surged upon the beach.
zh: 海浪一波接一波地拍打着沙滩。

en: The sea was white with foam.
zh: 海面上全是白色的浪花。

en: The waves dashed the shore.

en: The waves dashed against the rocks.

en: Waves are breaking against the rocks.

en: The waves are subsiding.

en: Nothing was to be heard except the sound of the waves.
zh: 除了浪涛声，什么也听不见。

en: The waves carried me off my feet.
zh: 浪大得把我整个人都冲走了。

en: The wave knocked me off my feet.
zh: 一个浪头把我打翻在地。

en: Tears are a child's weapon.
zh: 眼泪是小孩子的武器。

en: The waves are rising.

en: Waves are beating the shore.

en: The waves are high.

en: The waves dashed against the seawall.
zh: 海浪撞击着防波堤。

en: The waves washed upon the rocks.

en: Waves were battering the shore.

en: The waves swallowed up the boat.
zh: 巨浪把小船给吞没了。

en: Farmers rebelled against the government.

en: Farmers produce crops.

en: Farmers are still sitting on the fence over which candidate to back.

en: The peasant scattered the seeds of grain.

en: The farmers didn't know what to do.

en: The farmers were scattering seed on the fields.

en: The peasants were planting rice.

en: Farmers work hard in the winter, too.
zh: 农民在冬天也干得挺辛苦的。

en: Farmers sow seeds in the spring.

en: Farmers cultivate the soil.

en: The farmer plants the corn in the spring.

en: The farmer pitched the hay onto the wagon.

en: Farmers store vegetables for the winter.

en: The farmers complained that because of the dry weather there would be a poor harvest of winter grain.
zh: 农民们抱怨说因为天气太旱，冬粮要减产了。

en: The farmer is scattering seeds over the field.

en: The transition from farm life to city life is often difficult.
zh: 从农村生活转向城市生活通常挺难的。

en: The farmer plowed his field all day.

en: The farm is three miles beyond the river.

en: Some farmers are working on the farm.

en: There is a man working on the farm.

en: The crops are up to the average.

en: Farmhouses have barns.

en: Thanks to the development of agricultural science, world food production has managed to keep up with population growth - but only at the expense of the future.
zh: 幸亏农业科学的发展，全球粮食产量才跟上了人口增长，但这可是以牺牲未来为代价的。

en: Agriculture is defined as the cultivation of soil for growing crops.

en: What about farming?

en: Agriculture is economy of the country.

zh: 农场有个小伙子不小心在路上把一整车小麦给弄翻了。

en: Would you like to be a farm boy?

en: The stable is right behind the farm house.

en: The farm owner has a large farm.

en: The farmer looked at Tony, "How old are you, boy?" he asked.
zh: 农民瞅了瞅托尼，问：“孩子，你多大了？”

en: The farmer liked to keep them busy.
zh: 那个农民喜欢让他们一直忙个不停。

en: "I want to be a farmer," said Pip.

en: The farm includes 160 acres.

en: The farm abuts on the road.

en: I'll take your EEG.

zh: 做脑部手术的时候，医生和护士动作必须非常轻柔，还得尽可能地快。

en: I had a cerebral contusion.

en: Ability is the only factor considered in promoting employees.

en: Ability alone is not enough.

en: Noh is a traditional Japanese art.

en: Natto is sticky.

en: What a pain!
zh: 真是烦死人了！

en: Although natto smells awful, it is delicious.
zh: 虽说纳豆闻着臭，但吃着挺香。

en: Natto smells awful but tastes delicious.
zh: 纳豆闻起来很难闻，但吃着倒不错。

en: "Natto" smells awful but tastes terrific.
zh: “纳豆”闻着臭，吃起来味道却绝了。

en: Natto reminds me of a bad experience.

en: Each taxpayer has the right to know where his money goes.
zh: 每个纳税人都有权知道自己的钱花哪儿了。

en: All taxpayers have the right to know where their money goes.
zh: 所有纳税人都有权知道他们的钱都去哪儿了。

en: Taxpayers are angry about wasteful government spending.

en: The barn door had been carelessly left unlatched.
zh: 谷仓门一时粗心没插上。

en: On entering the barn, he found a missing bike.
zh: 他进谷仓的时候，发现了一辆丢了的自行车。

en: Don't keep the car in the barn.
zh: 别把车停在谷仓里。

en: Don't keep the bicycle in the barn.
zh: 别把自行车放在谷仓里。

en: The fog soon blurred out the figure of a man walking in front of him.
zh: 雾很快就遮住了前面那个人的身影。

en: It is dangerous to fly in this heavy fog.
zh: 雾这么大，飞行太危险了。

en: Not a soul was to be seen because of a dense fog.
zh: 雾太浓了，连个人影都看不见。

en: Because of the heavy fog, not a single person could be seen.
zh: 因为雾太大，一个人也看不见。

en: Because of the dense fog, nobody could be seen.
zh: 雾太厚了，谁也看不见。

en: The freight train was held up about half an hour because of a dense fog.
zh: 货运列车因为浓雾耽搁了半个多小时。

en: The thick fog made it hard to see the road.
zh: 雾太大了，路都看不清。

en: The heavy fog made it impossible for us to see anything in front of us.
zh: 雾这么大，前面啥也看不见。

en: Our plane couldn't land on account of the dense fog.
zh: 因为大雾，我们的飞机降落不了。

en: In addition to a thick fog, there was a heavy swell.
zh: 除了大雾，海上还有大浪。

en: Dense bushes concealed him.

en: The thick fog blotted out everything.
zh: 浓雾把一切都遮住了。

en: The thick fog prevented the plane from taking off.

zh: 大雾让我们的航班延误了。

en: The dense fog made the building invisible.
zh: 雾太大了，连那栋楼都看不见了。

en: Strong coffee kept her awake all night.
zh: 浓咖啡让她一整晚都没睡着。

en: On account of having drunk some strong coffee, she wasn't able to sleep all night long.
zh: 因为喝了浓咖啡，她一宿没合眼。

en: I like weak coffee better than strong.
zh: 比起浓咖啡，我更喜欢淡一点的。

en: There is no profit in worrying.
zh: 发愁也没用。

en: Laughing troubles away is characteristic of him.
zh: 遇事一笑置之是他的风格。

en: I have mucous in my stool.
zh: 我大便里有粘液。

en: The fuel shortage awoke the country to the need for developing atomic energy.
zh: 燃料短缺让国家意识到了开发核能的必要性。

en: Fuel economy is a big advantage of this car.
zh: 省油是这辆车的一大优点。

en: Petroleum was replacing coal as fuel.
zh: 石油正在取代煤炭成为燃料。

en: There's a fuel shortage even in the Tokyo area.

en: There was a shortage of fuel.

en: It was brave of you to go into the burning house.
zh: 你冲进着火的房子里，真是太勇敢了。

en: The firemen's face was grim when he came out of the burning house.
zh: 消防员从着火的房子里出来时，脸色很凝重。

en: I repeat it by way of caution.
zh: 我再说一遍是为了提醒你。

en: Let me remind you again that March 31st is the due date.
zh: 我再提醒你一下，3月31号是截止日期。

en: Let's take an X-ray just in case.
zh: 以防万一，咱们还是拍个X光片吧。

en: Enclosed is a copy of the bank transfer receipt.
zh: 附件里有银行转账回执的复印件。

en: Have something to eat just in case.
zh: 先吃点东西吧，以防万一。

en: You must think of your old parents.
zh: 你得为你年迈的父母想想。

en: The old man leaned forward and asked his wife with a soft voice.
zh: 老头儿凑过去，小声地问了他老伴一句。

en: Old Mr Smith is saving as much money as he can.
zh: 史密斯老先生正尽可能地多攒钱。

en: Her age qualifies her for the job.

en: Try to act your age.

en: People of all ages like this song.

en: We cannot ask anything about age or physical problems.
zh: 我们不能询问任何有关年龄或身体状况的问题。

en: I am eighteen years old.
zh: 我十八岁了。

en: I'm 18 years old.
zh: 我十八岁。

en: I am 18 years old.
zh: 我今年十八岁。

en: I'm eighteen.
zh: 我十八。

en: Every person will be admitted regardless of his or her age.
zh: 不论年龄大小，任何人都可以加入。

en: Regardless of age, everybody can apply for it.
zh: 不论年龄大小，谁都可以申请。

en: Age discrimination is illegal and retirement is mandatory in only a few occupations.
zh: 年龄歧视是违法的，只有少数职业才强制退休。

en: When annualized, the quarterly gain represents a 4% growth.
zh: 按年率计算，这个季度的增长为4%。

en: There is no easy cure-all for old economic ills.
zh: 经济上的陈年顽疾没法一下根治。

en: We must complete the bond by the end of this year.
zh: 我们必须在年底前完成合同。

en: I will have obtained a driver's license by the end of the year.
zh: 年底前我就能拿到驾照了。

en: We shall go on reading this book until the end of the year.

en: We shall go on reading this book till the end of the year.
zh: 这本书我们要一直读到年底。

en: We'll read this book until the end of the year.

en: We're likely to continue reading this book up to the end of the year.

en: We become very shorthanded at the end of the year.
zh: 到年底我们人手会非常紧张。

en: From year to year they were growing poorer.
zh: 他们一年比一年穷了。

en: Older people are often afraid of trying new things.
zh: 老年人往往不敢尝试新事物。

en: Older people still remember the Kennedy assassination.
zh: 上了年纪的人还记得肯尼迪遇刺的事。

en: As is often the case with old people, my grandfather keeps early hours.

zh: 日本人通常不怎么守时。

en: The Japanese pride themselves on Mt. Fuji, a cone-shaped mountain.
zh: 日本人为圆锥形的富士山感到自豪。

en: The Japanese are generally considered to be very industrious.
zh: 大家普遍认为日本人非常勤劳。

en: The Japanese eat rice at least once a day.
zh: 日本人每天至少吃一顿米饭。

en: Japanese people take three meals a day.
zh: 日本人一天吃三顿饭。

en: Japanese eat three meals a day.
zh: 日本人一日三餐。

en: The Japanese used to live mainly on rice.
zh: 日本人以前主要是以米饭为主食。

en: We often hear it said that Japanese are good workers.
zh: 我们常听人说日本人干活很勤快。

en: The Japanese are not punctual compared with the Europeans.
zh: 和欧洲人比起来，日本人不怎么守时。

en: The Japanese are often criticized for being inward looking and insufficiently international in their outlook.
zh: 日本人常被批评太保守，国际化程度不够。

en: Japanese people tend to think that way.
zh: 日本人倾向于那样想。

en: The Japanese have tried to learn the Western way of thinking and feeling for the past hundred years.
zh: 过去一百年来，日本人一直尝试学习西方的思维和情感表达方式。

en: The Japanese make a group and tend to act together.
zh: 日本人喜欢抱团，倾向于集体行动。

en: The Japanese eat more beef than the British do.
zh: 日本人比英国人吃更多的牛肉。

en: It is said that Japanese people don't celebrate Christmas the way Americans do.
zh: 据说日本人过圣诞节的方式跟美国人不一样。

en: Japanese should not forget that America is a multiracial nation.
zh: 日本人不该忘记美国是一个多民族国家。

en: Japanese are not so particular about religion.
zh: 日本人对宗教没那么讲究。

en: The Japanese attacked Pearl Harbor on December 7, 1941.
zh: 日本人在1941年12月7日偷袭了珍珠港。

en: The Japanese tend to identify themselves with the group they belong to.
zh: 日本人往往更看重自己的集体身份。

en: During O-bon, Japanese people believe they receive a visit from an ancestor.
zh: 在盂兰盆节期间，日本人相信祖先会回来探望。

en: What do you think are the racial traits of the Japanese?
zh: 你觉得日本人有什么民族特质？

en: The average life span of the Japanese has lengthened to a great extent.
zh: 日本人的平均寿命大大延长了。

en: Half of the Japanese people lead stressful lives.
zh: 有一半的日本人生活压力很大。

en: Some Japanese are shy even to the point of appearing rude.
zh: 有些日本人太害羞了，甚至到了让人觉得没礼貌的地步。

en: Some Japanese are concerned about how their country looks in the eyes of foreigners.
zh: 有些日本人很在意外国人的眼光。

en: Some Japanese may continue to sleep with both parents even during elementary school days.
zh: 有些日本孩子即使上了小学，可能还会跟父母一起睡。

en: Lots of people in Japan are indifferent to politics.
zh: 日本有很多人对政治漠不关心。

en: It is the particular environment that has shaped the Japanese mentality.
zh: 是特殊的生存环境塑造了日本人的心态。

en: The population of Japan is larger than that of Britain.
zh: 日本的人口比英国多。

en: It's very difficult even for a Japanese to put on a kimono.
zh: 就算是对日本人来说，穿和服也很难。

en: There is a tendency for Japanese to want to know a certain amount of personal information about someone such as age, position and whether they are married or not, before they feel comfortable talking with a stranger.
zh: 日本人有个倾向，就是在跟陌生人搭话前，想先了解对方的年龄、职位和婚否等信息，这样他们才觉得自在。

en: To Japanese, an American baby sleeping by himself seems lonely.
zh: 对日本人来说，美国宝宝一个人睡看起来挺孤独的。

en: A Japanese would not have said such a thing.
zh: 日本人是不会说出这种话来的。

en: A Japanese wouldn't do such a thing.
zh: 日本人不会做这种事。

en: It is not always easy to distinguish the Japanese from the Chinese.
zh: 区分日本人和中国人并不总是那么容易。

en: One of the important differences between Japanese and Americans is that Japanese tend to choose a safe course in life, while Americans choose to explore and challenge life.
zh: 日本人和美国人之间一个很重要的区别是，日本人倾向于选择安稳的生活，而美国人则喜欢去探索和挑战生活。

en: Few Japanese can use English well.
zh: 没几个日本人能把英语说好。

en: Even Japanese can make mistakes when they speak Japanese.
zh: 就算是日本人，说日语的时候也会犯错。

en: Are you a Japanese citizen?
zh: 你是日本公民吗？

en: Are you Japanese?
zh: 你是日本人吗？

en: Is he Japanese?
zh: 他是日本人吗？

en: Is she Japanese?
zh: 她是日本人吗？

en: As the Japanese like baseball, so the Americans like football.
zh: 就像日本人喜欢棒球一样，美国人也喜欢橄榄球。

en: Americans like football in the same way that Japanese like baseball.
zh: 美国人喜欢橄榄球，就像日本人喜欢棒球那样。

en: We often hear it said that the Japanese are good workers.
zh: 我们常听人说，日本人干活很卖力。

en: It is difficult for Japanese people to speak English fluently.
zh: 日本人很难流利地讲英语。

en: Japanese speakers of English often have difficulty in dealing with informal conversation, such as at parties or in small informal groups.
zh: 说英语的日本人在应对非正式谈话时常感到困难，比如在派对上或是非正式的小圈子里。

en: Americans appear unsettled and uncontrolled to Japanese.
zh: 在日本人看来，美国人显得很浮躁且不受约束。

en: What makes the Japanese unique is primarily their belief that they are unique.
zh: 日本人之所以独特，主要是因为他们深信自己是独特的。

en: There are some reasons why the Japanese find it hard to act unlike others.
zh: 日本人觉得很难做到与众不同，这是有原因的。

en: Not a few foreigners like Japanese food.
zh: 不少外国人都喜欢日本料理。

en: Have you got used to eating Japanese food yet?
zh: 你习惯吃日本菜了吗？

en: Have you gotten used to eating Japanese food yet?
zh: 你已经习惯吃日本料理了吗？

en: Japanese women are believed to be very clever with their hands.
zh: 人们普遍认为日本女性的手很巧。

en: Whenever I drink sake, I get a headache.
zh: 我一喝清酒就头疼。

en: Japanese cars sell well overseas.
zh: 日本车在海外卖得很好。

en: The prices of Japanese automobiles are still comparatively high.
zh: 日本汽车的价格目前还是比较高的。

en: We went to the museum to study Japanese history.
zh: 我们去博物馆了解日本历史。

en: Japanese history is my favorite subject.
zh: 日本历史是我最喜欢的科目。

en: Some students are not interested in Japanese history.
zh: 有些学生对日本历史不感兴趣。

en: The Japanese people have renounced war.
zh: 日本人民已经宣布放弃战争。

en: Have you ever read the Constitution of Japan?
zh: 你读过日本宪法吗？

en: The university paid my way to Japan.
zh: 大学出钱资助我去了日本。

en: Where is the Japan Airlines counter?
zh: 日本航空的柜台在哪里？

en: Where is the boarding gate for Japan Airlines 124?
zh: 日本航空124号航班的登机口在哪里？

en: What is the hard part of learning Japanese?
zh: 学日语最难的地方是什么？

en: Does someone here speak Japanese?
zh: 这儿有人会说日语吗？

en: There are many Americans who can speak Japanese.
zh: 有很多美国人会说日语。

en: Is there a Japanese-speaking stewardess?
zh: 有会说日语的空姐吗？

en: Speaking Japanese is easy for me.
zh: 说日语对我来说挺容易的。

en: Many foreigners come to Japan for the purpose of studying Japanese.
zh: 很多外国人去日本是为了学习日语。

en: Having studied Japanese, Jenny had no trouble in Japan.
zh: 因为学过日语，珍妮在日本没遇到什么困难。

en: Since Jenny had studied Japanese, she had no trouble in Japan.
zh: 既然珍妮学过日语，她在日本就没遇到什么麻烦。

en: What do you think of Japanese?
zh: 你觉得日语怎么样？

en: People often say that Japanese is a difficult language.
zh: 人们常说日语很难学。

en: Japanese has something in common with Korean.
zh: 日语和韩语有一些共同点。

en: Japanese is our mother tongue.
zh: 日语是我们的母语。

en: Our native language is Japanese.
zh: 我们的母语是日语。

en: It is hard for foreigners to learn Japanese.
zh: 外国人很难学会日语。

en: Japanese is often said to be a difficult language to learn.
zh: 大家都说日语挺难学的。

en: Japanese is not used in this country.
zh: 这个国家不使用日语。

en: Call someone who speaks Japanese, please.
zh: 请叫一个会说日语的人来。

en: Do you know any doctors who speak Japanese?
zh: 你认识会说日语的医生吗？

en: Do you have any employees who speak Japanese?
zh: 你们有会说日语的员工吗？

en: What is difficult about Japanese is how characters are used in its writing system.
zh: 日语的难点在于书写系统中汉字的使用方式。
